events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still has not arrived. The tracking information hasn’t updated for several days, and I’m really worried about the delay.
The reported problem has been identified as a delivery delay based on the keywords and message content about shipping and tracking updates.
A support agent has been assigned to your case to help resolve this delivery delay issue promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help you track down your package and get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide me with your order number and any tracking details you have, so I can investigate the status of your shipment?
Sure, the order number is 987654321 and the tracking number is ZX123456789US. The last update was from five days ago, showing that the package was in transit.
Thank you for the details. I contacted the courier and arranged for a priority status update. If your package doesn’t arrive within the next two days, we can issue a replacement or full refund.
I appreciate your quick response and the offer to replace my order if it doesn’t arrive soon. That really puts me at ease, thanks!
We have confirmed that your package was delivered today. Please check your mailbox or with your neighbors in case it was left safely. Let us know if you still cannot find it.
Just following up to ensure you received your order and that everything is in good condition. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Since your package has arrived and there are no further issues, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting us.
